alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 1:43PM PST until January 14 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches above 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 11 inches above 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels continue to rise across northeast Nevada with lesser impacts to major lower-elevation roadways, most below 6000 feet. Moderate to heavy snow is still expected along passes and higher elevation roadways.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
